result.eng: Have you got any news?

result.eng: Any news?

result.eng: The stories are about soldiers who are killed and women who are left behind.
result.ga: baineann na scéalta le saighdiúirí a mharaítear agus na mná a fhágtar ina ndiaidh
result.orig: Baineann na scéalta le saighdiúirí a mharaítear agus na mná a fhágtar ina ndiaidh
result.html: baineann na scéalta le saighdiúirí a mharaítear agus na mná a fhágtar ina ndiaidhThe stories are about soldiers who are killed and women who are left behind.
result.ponchtml: baineann na scéalta le saiġdiúirí a ṁaraítear agus na mná a ḟágtar ina ndiaiḋThe stories are about soldiers who are killed and women who are left behind.

result.eng: She had heard the story from her mother who was seventy at that time.
result.ga: chuala sí an scéal óna máthair a bhí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sin
result.orig: Chuala sí an scéal óna máthair a bhí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sin
result.html: chuala sí an scéal óna máthair a bhí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sinShe had heard the story from her mother who was seventy at that time.
result.ponchtml: ċuala sí an scéal óna máṫair a ḃí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sinShe had heard the story from her mother who was seventy at that time.

result.eng: Anyway, to make a long story short...
result.ga: cibé ar bith le scéal fada a dhéanamh gairid
result.orig: Cibé ar bith le scéal fada a dhéanamh gairid
result.html: cibé ar bith le scéal fada a dhéanamh gairidAnyway, to make a long story short...
result.ponchtml: cibé ar biṫ le scéal fada a ḋéanaṁ gairidAnyway, to make a long story short...

result.eng: Listen, did you hear the story?
result.ga: cogar ar chuala tú an scéal
result.orig: Cogar ar chuala tú an scéal
result.html: cogar ar chuala tú an scéalListen, did you hear the story?
result.ponchtml: cogar ar ċuala tú an scéalListen, did you hear the story?

result.eng: We publish detective stories.
result.ga: cuireann muid scéalta bleachtaireachta i gcló
result.orig: Cuireann muid scéalta bleachtaireachta i gcló
result.html: cuireann muid scéalta bleachtaireachta i gclóWe publish detective stories.
result.ponchtml: cuireann muid scéalta bleaċtaireaċta i gclóWe publish detective stories.

result.eng: Wait till you hear the news.
result.ga: fan go gcloisfidh tú an scéal
result.orig: Fan go gcloisfidh tú an scéal
result.html: fan go gcloisfidh tú an scéalWait till you hear the news.
result.ponchtml: fan go gcloisfiḋ tú an scéalWait till you hear the news.

result.eng: Tell us a story, daddy.
result.ga: inis scéal dúinn a dhaidí
result.orig: Inis scéal dúinn a dhaidí
result.html: inis scéal dúinn a dhaidíTell us a story, daddy.
result.ponchtml: inis scéal dúinn a ḋaidíTell us a story, daddy.

result.eng: It is bad news.
result.ga: is bocht an scéal é
result.orig: Is bocht an scéal é
result.html: is bocht an scéal éIt is bad news.
result.ponchtml: is boċt an scéal éIt is bad news.

result.eng: It's a good detective story if the murder happens in the first paragraph.
result.ga: is maith an scéal bleachtaireachta é ina dtarlaíonn an dúnmharú sa chéad alt

result.eng: The news spread from person to person.
result.ga: scaip an scéal ó dhuine go duine

result.html: scaip an scéal ó dhuine go duineThe news spread from person to person.
result.ponchtml: scaip an scéal ó ḋuine go duineThe news spread from person to person.

result.eng: Spread the news through your social networks.
result.ga: scaipigí an scéal trí bhur gcuid líonraí sóisialta

result.eng: A story about a little girl who goes to the wood.
result.ga: scéal faoi chailín beag a théann isteach sa choill

result.html: scéal faoi chailín beag a théann isteach sa choillA story about a little girl who goes to the wood.

result.eng: That's the end of the story, my friends.
result.ga: sin deireadh leis an scéal a chairde

result.eng: That's the whole story.
result.ga: sin é an scéal uile

result.html: sin é an scéal uileThat's the whole story.
result.ponchtml: sin é an scéal uileThat's the whole story.

result.eng: It seems that it will be easy.
result.ga: tá an chuma ar an scéal go mbeidh sé éasca

result.html: tá an chuma ar an scéal go mbeidh sé éascaIt seems that it will be easy.

result.eng: It seems that not many jobs are available.

result.eng: The two stories are intertwined.

result.eng: This matter is becoming controversial.
result.ga: tá an scéal seo ag éirí conspóideach

result.ga: tá an scéal seo go hiomlán cumtha

result.eng: Do you have any news tonight?

result.eng: I don't have any news at all.
result.ga: níl scéal ar bith agam
result.orig: Níl scéal ar bith agam
result.html: níl scéal ar bith agamI don't have any news at all.
result.ponchtml: níl scéal ar biṫ agamI don't have any news at all.

result.eng: What is special about the story is that you can never be sure of anything.
result.ga: tá sé de bhua ag an scéal nach féidir bheith cinnte faoi aon rud
result.orig: Tá sé de bhua ag an scéal nach féidir bheith cinnte faoi aon rud
result.html: tá sé de bhua ag an scéal nach féidir bheith cinnte faoi aon rudWhat is special about the story is that you can never be sure of anything.
result.ponchtml: tá sé de ḃua ag an scéal naċ féidir ḃeiṫ cinnte faoi aon rudWhat is special about the story is that you can never be sure of anything.

result.eng: I don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.
result.ga: ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn é
result.orig: Ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn é
result.html: ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn éI don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.
result.ponchtml: ní cuiṁin liom gaċ pioc den scéal aċ is cuiṁin liom gur inis sé go hálainn éI don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.

result.eng: I'm sorry to hear that.
result.ga: is bocht liom do scéal
result.orig: Is bocht liom do scéal
result.html: is bocht liom do scéalI'm sorry to hear that.
result.ponchtml: is boċt liom do scéalI'm sorry to hear that.

result.eng: But that was not the end of the story.
result.ga: ach níorbh shin é deireadh an scéil
result.orig: Ach níorbh shin é deireadh an scéil
result.html: ach níorbh shin é deireadh an scéilBut that was not the end of the story.
result.ponchtml: aċ níorḃ ẛin é deireaḋ an scéilBut that was not the end of the story.

result.eng: Now now, you have everybody in the house confused with your stories.
result.ga: seo seo tá a bhfuil sa teach amú ag do chuid scéalta
result.orig: Seo seo tá a bhfuil sa teach amú ag do chuid scéalta
result.html: seo seo tá a bhfuil sa teach amú ag do chuid scéaltaNow now, you have everybody in the house confused with your stories.
result.ponchtml: seo seo tá a ḃfuil sa teaċ amú ag do ċuid scéaltaNow now, you have everybody in the house confused with your stories.

result.eng: That's what they say about him, be it true or false.
result.ga: táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéal
result.orig: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéal
